desc.zh_tw: 阿拜多斯高中面临了废校危机。和对策委员会一起保护学校吧！

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.ko: The Foreclosure Task Force was formed to prevent Abydos High School from closing. The school's debt persists despite the students' best efforts.
desc.zh_tw: 為了阻止廢校而建立的對策委員會。雖然每天都在苦撐，但學校的債務一點都沒有減少的跡象。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 为了阻止废校而建立的对策委员会。虽然每天都在苦撑，但学校的债务一点都没有减少的迹象。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 为了阻止废校而建立的对策委员会。虽然每天都在苦撑，但学校的债务一点都没有减少的迹象。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force is hanging on by a thread. Will they be able to fight back against the conspiracy that threatens their academy's survival?

desc.zh_tw: 陷入困境的阿拜多斯對策委員會。與威脅阿拜多斯高中存亡的陰謀鬥爭，結果會是……?

desc.en: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.thai: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.ko: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部正在請求協助。必須在限時內做出完美的遊戲!
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部正在请求协助。必须在限时内做出完美的游戏！

desc.en: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.thai: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.ko: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.zh_tw: 千年的遊戲開發部陷入了廢社危機。熱愛遊戲但成員與實績都不足的她們,能順利製作出「神作」嗎?
desc.zh_cn_jp: 千年的游戏开发部陷入了废社危机。热爱游戏但成员与实绩都不足的她们，能顺利制作出“神作”吗？
desc.zh_cn_tw: 千年的游戏开发部陷入了废社危机。热爱游戏但成员与实绩都不足的她们，能顺利制作出“神作”吗？

desc.en: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.thai: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.ko: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部全員為了下一屆千年大賞，開始製作新遊戲。但就在此時，學生會長莉央出現了——被告知的真相和突如其來的危機。遊戲開發部能平安度過此劫嗎？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部全员为了下一届千年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，游戏开发部能平安渡过此劫吗？

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部全员为了下一届千年大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长莉央出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，游戏开发部能平安渡过此劫吗？

desc.en: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?

desc.thai: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.ko: Gehenna and Trinity academies are sworn enemies. Will they ever see eye to eye?
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜和三一是死對頭。這兩間學校真的能和解嗎？

desc.en: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.jp: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.thai: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.ko: Save the troubled youth of Trinity who are at risk of failing out. Take charge of the Make-Up Work Club and lead your students to success!
desc.zh_tw: 四名三一的學生即將被留級。請成為指引她們的「補課部」班導師，將她們 從危機中解救出來吧！
desc.zh_cn_jp: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！
desc.zh_cn_tw: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！
desc.zh_cn_cn: 四名三一的学生即将被留级。请成为指引她们的“补课部”班导师，将她们从危机中解救出来吧！

desc.en: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?
desc.jp: Conspiracy and betrayal, suspicion and doubt, scheming and shadow wars are running rampant. Will Sensei be able to safely overcome the crisis with the Make-Up Work Club students?

desc.zh_tw: 在這個陰謀、懷疑及背叛交織的黑暗中，補課部的學生們能平安度過這場危機嗎？
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在这个阴谋、怀疑与背叛交际的黑暗中，补课部的学生们能平安度过这场危机吗？

desc.en: 终于迎来了伊甸园条约签字仪式的当天。看似和平的日常生活出现了裂缝，混乱与憎恶的入侵正在加速。最终收束的目的地将会是“破局”，还是——

desc.jp: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.thai: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.ko: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.zh_tw: 出現於日常的微小裂痕，安穩日子的崩壞僅在轉瞬之間……
desc.zh_cn_jp: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.zh_cn_tw: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——
desc.zh_cn_cn: 出现于日常的微小裂痕，安稳日子的崩坏仅在转瞬之间——

desc.en: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.jp: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？
desc.thai: 在奇普托斯各地观测到的微小异常。立于薄冰之上的日常崩坏，疑惑和阴谋彼此纠缠——究竟夏莱能不能克服这个危机呢？

desc.zh_tw: 在奇普托斯各地觀測到的微小異常。立於薄冰之上的日常崩毀，疑惑和陰謀彼此糾纏——究竟夏萊能不能克服這個危機呢？
